For usage please read the documentation:
----------------------------------------

http://carousel.codeplex.com/
   and
http://carousel.codeplex.com/documentation


~/Scripts/MyClientControls/RegisterMyClientControls.js
------------------------------------------------------

The file "RegisterMyClientControls.js" is called from the 
Microsoft Ajax Framework file - Start.js.

If not exists this file (RegisterMyClientControls.js), 
then rename this file:
    _RegisterMyClientControls_adpanel.js

If exists, the copy the content from 
   _RegisterMyClientControls_carousel.js to the file
   RegisterMyClientControls.js.

If You don't use the ASP.NET - use only html context - the you can 
download the Microsoft Ajax Framework Client side scripts from the
codeplex.com:

http://ajaxcontroltoolkit.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest#ReadMe.html

Script directory:
../SampleWebSites/AjaxClientWebSite/Scripts  *

* If not exists in the latest, then you can find it in the version a2a6dc6854e0 - date: 2013.01.31.
     changeset a2a6dc6854e0 url: http://ajaxcontroltoolkit.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/a2a6dc6854e0cfb4d11ffa81ad2c2383dfe35086#ReadMe.html
